docs.title: GenIR Reading Group
docs.text:
欢迎来到我们的 Generative Information Retrieval 阅读笔记网站！

我们会在这里整理： - 按主题分类的 GenIR 论文 - 每篇论文的 Paper + Code 链接 - 简短的一句话总结 - Roadmap（方法之间的关系图）

后续我们会继续补充内容。

docs.title: Papers: Document Retrieval
docs.text: This page organizes Generative Document Retrieval papers by their core innovation. To keep the page compact, each paper is listed using lightweight formatting (bold titles instead of section headers).

docs.title: 🔷 A. ID Space & Indexing Innovations
docs.text:
ASI – Autoregressive Search Index (ICLR 2023) 🔗 paper Hierarchical document IDs with multi-level tree structure for controlled ID generation. Tags: hierarchical-id, indexing

SEATER (2023) 🔗 paper Structured tree IDs to reduce ambiguity by decomposing GR errors. Tags: structured-id, error-analysis

DCI – Discriminative Contrastive Indexing (SIGIR 2025) 🔗 paper (placeholder) Uses groupwise contrastive learning to produce discriminative document IDs. Tags: contrastive, id-learning

Corpus-Aligned ID Initialization (2024) 🔗 paper Initializes docIDs using synthetic queries aligned with corpus semantics. Tags: id-initialization, query-synthesis

docs.title: 🔷 B. Training Paradigms & Learning Signals
docs.text:
BM25-Labeled GR Training (2023) 🔗 paper Trains GR using BM25 pseudo relevance labels, enabling training without human annotations. Tags: pseudo-label, weak-supervision

Synthetic Query Learning (2024) 🔗 paper (placeholder) Uses LLM-generated synthetic queries to improve GR training and corpus coverage. Tags: synthetic-data, pretraining

Contrastive Hybrid Training (2025) 🔗 paper (placeholder) Combines generative decoding loss with contrastive objectives for discriminative docIDs. Tags: hybrid-training, contrastive

docs.title: 🔷 C. Model Architecture Innovations
docs.text:
GENRE (2020) 🔗 paper · code Early seq2seq generative retrieval using entity generation. Tags: seq2seq, entity-retrieval

T5 for Retrieval (2021) 🔗 paper Demonstrates encoder–decoder LMs can generate document IDs directly. Tags: t5, encoder-decoder

NOVA – Unified-to-Specialized Framework (AAAI 2026) 🔗 paper (placeholder) Multi-view encoder with specialized decoders for cross-modal and text-only retrieval. Tags: multi-view, decoder, architecture

docs.title: 🔷 D. Decoding & Inference Innovations
docs.text:
GR2 – Guided Decoding for GR (ICLR 2023) 🔗 paper Adds constrained / guided decoding for more accurate ID generation. Tags: guided-decoding, constraint

ReasonGR – Multi-Step Reasoning (NeurIPS 2024) 🔗 paper Models multi-hop reasoning during decoding to improve retrieval on complex queries. Tags: reasoning, multihop

CGBS Decoding (2025) 🔗 paper (placeholder) Cover-aware and constrained decoding for multimodal ID generation. Tags: cover-aware, multimodal, constraint
